name: Acne
description: Performer has a fair amount of visible acne typically on the face

name: Dark Skin
description: Performers with exceptionally dark skin tones.

name: Dimples
description: Performers with noticeable indentations or small hollows in their cheeks, typically appearing when they smile.

name: Dimples of Venus
description: Symmetrical indentations on the lower back, one on either side of the spine, just above the pelvic bone

name: Freckles
description: Performers with a significant number of freckles on the face or body.

name: Light Brown Skin
description: Performers with somewhat darker skin tones.

name: Medium Skin
description: Performers with generally light skin tones.

name: Pale Skin
description: Performers with exceptionally light skin tones.

name: Sacral Dimple
description: Single depression on the lower back, at the end of the spine

name: Scars
description: At least one performer has a visible scar

name: Stretch Marks
description: Colored lines or streaks on the skin

name: Sunburn
description: Redness of the skin caused by exposure to the sun

name: Tan Lines
description: Performers with significantly visible tan lines.

name: Tanned Skin
description: Performers with lightly bronzed skin tones.
